gui.dialog

Class StartDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • gui.dialog.StartDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class StartDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Extension of the JDialog class. Represents the starting dialog of the application. Contains the options for choosing the language of the application and the connection type based on user's location.
    Author:
    Milan Radeta
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
